function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to lack of multi-disciplinary collaboration","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in cloud-assisted wastewater management system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of water-borne diseases due to ineffective water quality management","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of predictive analytics and machine learning for covid-19 prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of ai in covid-19 diagnosis and prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for health passports","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai for real-time combat of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data mining and analysis for covid-19 monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time surveillance for covid-19 detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of waterborne diseases due to ineffective water management and infrastructure design","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public confidence in water management and safety measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective response to pandemic signs and outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective and inefficient treatment of wastewater due to change in water pattern and decline in water demand, leading to biosolid deposition, odour, and corrosion.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of pharmaceutical products in wastewater due to increased demand, posing challenges for old age wastewater treatment plants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater from covid-19 patients, highlighting the risk of spreading the virus through inadequate treatment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of reagents and probes","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor predictive accuracy of model selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital revolution vulnerabilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using arima model for covid-19 prediction and forecasting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quantifying sar-cov-2 infectiousness using contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost analysis of wbe and clinical screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model evaluation may lead to inaccuracies in covid-19 predictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of vaccination and immunity rates in the model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for behavioral and social factors impacting disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model representation may lead to misunderstanding or misinterpretation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity around model variables and equations may hinder effective analysis and decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sar-cov-2 in a smart city due to transmission dynamics and multiple dimensions of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of re-infection and loss of immunity over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undetected infected persons contributing to disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete assessment of sars-cov-2 prevalence in wastewater may lead to underestimation of infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in decay rate calculations may result in inaccurate estimation of virus survivability in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate modeling of virus spreading in smart cities may lead to ineffective pandemic control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of antimicrobial resistance genes args in influent’s wastewater using qpcr technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy issues in wastewater-based epidemiology wbe , leading to potential stigmatization in certain communities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in wbe surveillance of water and wastewater concerning covid-19, including the non-existence of biomarkers discovery pipeline, accounting for population size fluctuations, need for biomarker extraction technology, and lack of analytical tools.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale population surveillance may lead to privacy concerns and data misuse.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance may lead to complacency in individual testing and personal hygiene.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to identify specific infected individuals and locations may result in ineffective contact tracing and efficacy of disinfectant techniques in wastewater","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater treatment leading to presence of enveloped and non-enveloped pathogens in treatment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through water systems in developing countries with inadequate treatment
